TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlBindingsCollection extends System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection

summary.span: 代表控件的数据绑定的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of data bindings for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过添加完成简单数据绑定对象添加到。Simple data binding is accomplished by adding objects to a . 继承自任何对象类可以访问通过属性。Any object that inherits from the class can access the through the property. 对于支持数据绑定的控件的窗口的列表，请参阅类。For a list of Windows controls that support data binding, see the class. 包含标准收集方法，例如， ，和。The contains standard collection methods such as , , and . 为获得控件属于中，使用属性。To get the control that the belongs to, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加对象添加到的五个控件： 四个控件和控件。The following code example adds objects to a of five controls: four controls and a control. 通过 类的 属性来访问 。The is accessed through the property of the class.
